name: quackcoin_app
description: This repository contains a simple proof‑of‑concept implementation of the core components behind **Quack Coin**, a playful experiment blending audio‑oracles, meme‑driven tokenomics and on‑chain finance.  The goal of this project is to demonstrate how quack‑like recordings can be used to mint tokens, reward participants and drive a chaotic yet bounded price chart.
